topic.title: Communicating with the Author and Other Reviewers

keywords.indexterm: Reviewer GuideCommunicating with the Content Author

body.p:
As the Reviewer, to communicate with the Content Author or other Reviewers directly in the interface, follow these steps:
You can add messages from the Task Details page, or from the left panel in the Oxygen XML Web Author editor where you proofread and make changes to the files attached to the task.
Click the Add Message button and enter a message you want the Content Author and other Reviewers to see.
When finished entering your message, click Add. All messages are attached to the task and can be seen in the Task Details page and in the left panel when viewing or editing any of the files. From the Task Details page, you can also use the Looks Good button to send a predefined "Looks Good" message to the Content Author. The most common use for this button is that it simply offers a very quick way to let the Content Author know that all the files have been reviewed and they look good without needing any changes.
